segments.text: Hello . I am calling to apply for the job as an airlines staff . I'd like to check it . Is it part-time or a full-time job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , the job is a full-time one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does the job description say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need a person with ability and flexibility .
segments.speaker: S2
